title: Outputs the survey projection onto the agent or symbolic layer — make_projection
text: data data frame corresponding survey layer string flag specifying layer project "agent" produces network corresponding agents, assume rows data "symbolic" produces network corresponding symbols, items, assume columns data threshold_method string flag specifying edges selected network representation. "raw_similarity" means remove edges whose weight, meaning node similarity, specified threshold. "target_lcc" finds value threshold results network whose largest connected component close possible specified value. general range thresholds satisfy condition, choose upper limit range. "target_ad" finds value threshold results network whose average degree close possible specified value. method_value utility variable interpret according threshold_method chosen. threshold_method = "raw_similarity", method_value interpreted similarity threshold, thus range [-1, 1]. value -1 means edges removed, value 1 means edges removed. threshold_method = "target_lcc", method_value interpreted desired fractional size largest connected component, range [0, 1]. E.g., set 0, nodes connected, set 1, network sparse possible remaining fully connected. threshold_method = "target_ad", method_value interpreted desired average degree. assume method_value normalised range [0, 1] method_value = 0, nodes connected, method_value = 1, network complete, meaning contains every possible edge. centre FALSE, shift edge weights 1 [-1, 1] [0, 2]. Defaults TRUE. similarity_metric currently just one allowed value, namely Manhattan distance, default.
